mapper.select: select * from largeCategory2 order by largeIdx;
select * from product2 p RIGHT JOIN blockProduct2 b on p.idx = b.productIdx order by p.idx desc;

select * , o.idx as orderIdx , u.mid as sellerMid, u.name as sellerName, u.tel as sellerTel, u.email as sellerEmail , u2.mid as buyerMid, u2.name as buyerName, u2.tel as buyerTel, u2.email as buyerEmail from orderProduct2 o inner join user2 u on o.sellerIdx = u.idx inner join user2 u2 on o.buyerIdx = u2.idx inner join product2 p on p.idx = o.productIdx

select a.oc, b.uc, c.pc, d.rc from (select count(*) oc from orderProduct2 where orderDate between date(#{datepicker1}) and date(#{datepicker2})+1) a, (select count(*) uc from user2 where joinday between date(#{datepicker1}) and date(#{datepicker2})+1) b, (select count(*) pc from product2 where Date between date(#{datepicker1}) and date(#{datepicker2})+1) c, (select count(*) rc from productReply2 where rDate between date(#{datepicker1}) and date(#{datepicker2})+1) d

select.if: select *, u.mid as reportedMid, u2.mid as reporterMid from reportProduct2 r inner join user2 u on r.userIdx = u.idx inner join user2 u2 on r.reporterIdx = u2.idx inner join product2 p on r.productIdx= p.idx

select *, p.content as content, u.mid as reportedMid, u2.mid as reporterMid from reportReply2 r inner join user2 u on r.userIdx = u.idx inner join user2 u2 on r.reporterIdx = u2.idx inner join productReply2 p on r.replyIdx = p.idx inner join product2 pr on pr.idx = p.productIdx

mapper.update: update largeCategory2 set name = #{vo.category} where largeIdx = #{vo.largeIdx}
update midiumCategory2 set name = #{vo.category} where midiumIdx = #{vo.midiumIdx}
update smallCategory2 set name = #{vo.category} where smallIdx = #{vo.smallIdx}
mapper.delete: delete p.*,r.* from product2 p join reportProduct2 r on p.idx = r.productIdx where r.productIdx = #{idx}
delete p.*, r.* from productReply2 p join reportReply2 r on p.idx = r.replyIdx where p.idx = {idx}
